ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND($User.UserProfileName__c != 'TMB System Administrator', $User.UserProfileName__c != 'System Administrator'), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( Status ,'New' ), OR(ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Chat - ttb Web' ), ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Chat - Facebook' ), ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Chat - Line' ), ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Chat - ttb touch' ), ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Facebook' ), ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Other Media Type' ), ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Twitter' ), ISPICKVAL( Origin ,'Pantip' ))), false, IF(AND(PTA_Segment__c <> '', Category__c <> '', Sub_Category__c <> '', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = null), true, false)), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There are some internal error, Please cancel and create again. (ระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด กรุณาปิดแล้วสร้างเคสใหม่อีกครั้ง)
